sunda rayamuddaththadara waththu 92 jatilaththaharassa waththu 93 298 jethiyaththa(ra waththu 94 299 thatapubbakaththanara waththu 95 300 natapuththaka waththu 96 301 wandhisaththatharassa waththu 97 302 dhammadinthaththariya waththu 98 303 andgulimalaththakara waththu;. 99 304 dewandahika brahmanassa waththu 200 anyanyathara brayahamanasasa waththu .[sanskaranaya] anumodanadinan ananunyanyana kale, anumodanadi katayuthuyayi no anudath kalhi; upanisinatha kathan,1 mulu wahun kalhi katayuthu dhami kiya -bana asanuwata elaba hunuwanata katayuthu dhami kiya ew; thulan, thala dandu; wimuthathi, rahath pala; wimuthathinyana dasasana, pas wikhambaun nyan; heda wuthathakarana, wadarana papa pariwajajana karun. 231 thiththiuyanan waththu[sanskaranaya] balisikan, bili waddakhu; balisena, bilin 202 balisikayada waththu[sanskaranaya] pababajitha kichawan, pawija kisa- bhawun piliwetha- yuseyi, kamara khyahapadayen nikuth bawin anagami sukha; nekakhamama sukha-nami 203 samabahulanan bhikakhunan waththu[sanskaranaya] ekun wisiwana dhamamada waga atuwa sathya nimi.
